JobPositionInformation.PositionTitle: Experienced Reach Truck Driver to DSV evening
JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Nr. 171817

Energetic Reach Truck Driver to a fantastic workplace in Hedehusene. Do you enjoy different types of tasks? If so, read more here.

The job

This is a job with our customer, DSV, where you become part of a large team that focuses on a good working environment. It is a must that you want to work and make a difference in your working day, as you must jointly help to achieve the team's goals. You must therefore be motivated to perform and perform your best, as you will be measured on your productivity.

The team is responsible for unpacking goods and ensuring that they are placed correctly in the warehouse. A large part of the work takes place using a row truck and it is, therefore, a huge plus if you have experience with this. If not, it is key that you are experienced with delivery of goods, communications with truck drivers, load and unload trucks. 

It is important that you are proactive and ready to tackle without the use of a truck. The work tasks that must be solved without the use of a truck are more physically demanding and thus it is important to appreciate the combination of physical work and the use of a truck.

If you are interested in innovative solutions and development, this warehouse is the perfect ever-changing workplace. It is a brand-new warehouse, where one of several exciting initiatives is that they have drones flying around the warehouse.

Your profile

As a person, you are productive and always committed to your work tasks. You are detail-oriented and deliver a high-quality result. It is a must that you have a positive attitude, are a stable employee, and prioritize showing up on time.

Working hours and salary

We will have ongoing startup - so send us your application today.

The working hours are Monday-Thursday 14:00-22:00 and Friday 14:00-21:30.

Salary and terms of employment are based on the applicable collective agreement.

We are looking forward to hearing from you!
